emojis.use: happy and hopeful, or looking forward to something
triumph or superiority over something, similar to crossing arms or "hah"
when doing something effortless, i.e. "piece of cake"
saying something innocent, or used sarcastically when saying something not innocent or slightly evil

ex.message: Wish I could come over and prove it rn 😇

emojis.use: unsure about something, waiting for your reaction. i.e. "oop", sometimes expecting something negative
relieved about something, or embarrassed/apolegetic. i.e. "phew"
